ComicInfo.Series: Dicks: To the End of Time, Like
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Boys are back! No, not those boys, we're talking about Dougie and Ivor, the Dicks! These two miscreants from Belfast are on a quest to insult every single reader of the Dicks series. And with GARTH ENNIS and JOHN MCCREA together again you can bet that no horrific slander is left unsaid. Join us on a journey through the bowels of toilet humor that will change the way you look at comics. Yes, we hang our head in shame.
Available with Regular, Offensive, and Classic Moment Incentive covers by McCrea.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-----------|------------------------------------------|-------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | John McCrea | 1 | | Offensive | Offensive Cover | John McCrea | 2 | | RI | Classic Moments Retailer Incentive Cover | John McCrea | 3 |
ComicInfo.Title: 2: Cack to the Future
